name: NEW! Get Waisted by DD Daughters
description:
Style: AC2026 
Item: Get Waisted by DD Daughters Sport Latex Waist Cincher Body Shaper 
Colors: Azul Blue, NEW Neon Pink, NEW Neon Purple  
Sizes: XS-30, S-32, M-34, L-36, XL-38, 2X-40, 3X-42 

Description: #1 seller! The ultimate waist training corset - simply the best! Perfect for getting that hour glass look! Are you ready to maximize your workout with a style waist cinching garment? Get Waisted by DD Daughters is a waist cincher that you wear anytime you’re going to be active. Take it to the gym or for a run outside and let it add impact to your healthy lifestyle routine. Here’s how it works. You wrap the band around your midsection. This action creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity and ramping up perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin, while mobilizing fat cells. Put simply, the band helps ensure that your workout is working for you.  The band itself is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It sits at your waist, extending to the upper abdominals. Two columns of hook-and-eye closures allow you to size the garment down with you. FelixBoning anchors the cincher and prevents migration. If you’ve been thinking about adding a supplement to your active lifestyle, you’ll love the power the Workout Band ,Get Waisted by DD Daughters brings with it! 

RESULTS 
Midsection control 
Increased thermal activity 
Loss of inches reported 
Mobilizes fat cells 
Stimulates perspiration 

FEATURES 
Latex workout band 
Hook-and-eye closures 
FlexiBoning 
Cotton lining 

**Buy 3, get a Pink for Free**

name: Brazilian Spring Curl
description:
Type: Virgin Brazilian Hair

Texture: Spring Curl

Color: Natural Black or Natural Brown root/ Ombre light Brown as pictured

Weight: 3.5 oz

We are extremely proud to introduce to you our new premium line of virgin hair!

Our hair is 100% virgin hair, making it of great unmatched quality when compared to other types of hair. This is one of our best selling textures.

Our Virgin Brazilian Hair is very versatile. It blends in quite undetectably with your own hair or used on its own in a full wig or sew in.

This 100% human hair is in its virgin form 
(natural dark color 1b) at roots and colored Ombre Light Brown as pictured.

-3.5 oz each bundle 
-Comes from one donor, not mixed 
-100% unprocessed virgin temple hair 
-Reinforced wefts 
-Machine-made wefts 
-Tangle free 
-Healthy shine 
-Endless styling options 
-All cuticles are in the same direction 
-Our Two-Tone virgin hair comes in natural Natural Black root with Light Brown Ombre as pictured

Note: 2-3 bundles are needed for a full head of hair depending on the length and desired volume.

PLEASE NOTE: WEFTS ARE NOT PRE-SEALED -to ensure no shedding you may seal wefts with "Weft Sealer"

name: In Stock U-Part Wigs - Ready to Ship Now
description:
Most of our wigs are custom made to order, from time to time we offer ready to ship, U Part and L Part Wigs for sale in this section. The specifications are listed on each wig as far as what type of hair is included and what lengths and how many bundles used to complete and we'll do our best to price each wig at sale offers. Please ask any questions regarding the purchase of one of our in stock wigs as all sales are final.

These ready made u part wigs usually sell out the same day we list them, so if you're interested you should complete your order right away.

name: Make Me A Hand-Made Custom Wig
description:
How does our service work?

Our service includes our experience and expertise in constructing you a beautiful and affordable U Part Wig made with your hair up to three bundles of hair. You do have the option of send more bundles for an additional cost. You can also send us your closure for the option of having a full wig made. Our wigs are hand sewn using the fold over method. We do not cut the wefts until the very top.

We do not cut or style the wigs. We will however, layer your wig with different hair lengths that you provide to us. 

You provide your hair, We provide the service. We will also provide the u part wig cap. We also sell hair at www.dddaughters.com

We suggest that you send us new hair that is of a very good quality so that your U Part Wig will look fresh and beautiful. Please be sure that the hair is clean and free of nits before sending it to us. We reserve the right to send back any hair that we deem not fit to use for the construction of your wig.

You can send us as many bundles as you'd like to construct your wig. Be sure to send enough hair for us to complete your wig. For example, if you order a 24" u part wig, you would need to send us at least 3 bundles. 2 bundles would not be enough in this example however, 2 bundles would be fine for a wig up to 16" long. We recommend that you send at least 2 and a half bundles of hair. We will return any unused hair to you.

This service must be paid before we'll accept your hair.

Once you place your order, you will be provided with our shipping address on the confirmation invoice That is the address that you are to mail your hair to. Please include your invoice number and your last name on your package.

Our turnaround time is approximately 7 days from the date we receive your hair.

If you have any questions regarding this process, please click on the "contact us" button above to send us a message.

Disclaimer: Customer is also responsible for all shipping costs. We recommend that you purchase insurance on your hair package that you send to us and keep the package tracking information for your records. We are not responsible for any packages that may be lost in transit. We will ship your wig back to you the same way (insured and with a tracking #).

name: Remy Brazilian Blonde Lace Closures
description:
Type: Remy Russian Blonde Hair

Texture: Body Wave

Color: Blonde #613

Weight: 5g

Lead Time: 3 weeks

Our 100% Brazilian Texture Human hair is sourced from one donor comes in its most natural state. Brazilian Hair is very durable and can be used wash after wash without shedding or tangling. Our Brazilian hair comes in three styles. Straight, Body Wave and Loose Wave. 

All of our premium virgin hair comes in its most natural state. All of our virgin hair comes in natural shades of browns (light brown, brown,dark brown, and ocassionally black). 

We have chemically processed this hair professionally to achieve this blonde color #613 because it has been chemically processed, it is referred to as Remy Hair. 

 PLEASE NOTE: Knots are not pre-sealed on closures - to ensure no shedding or thinning you may seal your knots with "TDI Knot Sealer" or "Walker Top Knot".

name: Cambodian Virgin Hair
description:
Hailing from the roots of Cambodia, this form of virgin hair upholds its uniqueness in its baby fine hair shaft. This presents a soft and silky hair density, mainly suited to achieving long, layered locks.

For longer styles we would recommend an average of 3-4 packs, for shorter styles two packs is sufficient.
 

Weft (Weaving)  – Each bundle weighs 100grams/ 4oz.

Notice on Orders!


Please Note:

No Refunds, Exchanges only on hair in original packaging and in same order as received!

No Refunds or Exchanges on Tools/Accessories.

Please Allow 7-10 business days for all orders to be processed and shipped. All Tracking info will be provided immediately upon shipping. Shipping for all sale items will be through USPS at same price quoted during checkout. 

Wefts are not sealed on all orders at this time, however weft sealer is available for purchase through www.dddaughters.com!

Please feel free to contact us for additional information should you have a question or concern at dddsignaturehair@gmail.com or at 1(267) 281-4570. Please leave a detailed message for an immediate response.

name: Remy Brazilian Platinum Blonde Hair
Clip-Ins (Brazilian Virgin Straight)
description:
Our lustrous virgin Brazilian hair–in clip-ins! In it's natural state, this hair is soft and flowy with a medium luster. Durable clips and reinforced wefts make these clip in extensions long lasting. This hair is free of harsh chemicals making it a breeze to bleach, dye, or perm. With proper care and maintenance this hair will last up to and sometimes over a year.

Hair Type: 100% Virgin Human Hair 
Weft Type: Machine weft
Weight: Approximately 3.8 – 4 oz
Color: Natural Black/Brown

Wholesale (Popular amongst Retailers)
description:
This option is very popular amongst those who are in the retail sales business. Buying in bulk is extremely cost effective for new business owners, individuals, and stylist's.

1. Requires a minimal of 10 bundles referred to as 1 Kilo.

(original prices for lengths 16-22 is $100.00) 
(original price for lengths 24-32 is $125.00)

2. Bundles can be mixed in lengths but Can Not be mixed in texture.

Color: Natural Black or Natural Brown texture.

3. Because our most popular wholesale orders are requested in Peruvian Body Wave , Brazilian Body Wave, and Malaysian Body Wave textures. We refer to these selections as stock wholesale items.

4.We can supply different textures and ethnicities for wholesale orders that are not stock items but will require an additional 5 to 7 days shipping and handling time. Wholesale orders do not qualify for free shipping promotions.

5.Ombre'd Hair is not available for wholesale at this time.

name: Signature Hair Distributor Program
description:
Signature Hair Distributor

Hello Dolls & Gents! 
Do you love Signature Hair & want to become your very own boss? Well now's the time!

We have thousands of women & men across the world ask us how  they can become a distributor for Signature Hair? Where to start? How do this process work?! Well It's simple, very easy steps!

We have set up a system where you can now become a distributor for as low as $50. We build your website immediately to get you started TODAY! 


Enrollment! 

The enrollment fee is located on the online store, Signature Hair Distributor Enrollment Fee is 50.00 Dollars,

Once you pay the enrollment fee a Signature Hair Distributor Training Representative will contact you immediately! 

You will learn all details and all the information you need about starting your website, developing packaging, pricing, shipping details, and private phone coaching & much more! 

Once Management receives your payment you can then start making thousands! It's that easy!!! 

So enroll now! This program is set up for anyone ages 18 & older men, women, hair stylist, single moms, working parents, etc....

SIGNATURE HAIR IS APART OF MY SUCCESS STORY NOW I'M SHARING IT WITH YOU ALL... ENROLL AND START MAKING MONEY! 




NOTICE: All the information will be shared once enrollment is complete. Due to privacy of the business I will not be able to post or share anything else until you become a member!

name: Weft Sealer (FREE WITH PURCHASE OF 2 BUNDLES OF HAIR)
description: To seal wefts/tracks of hair to prevent shedding: Apply a thin coat of sealer to the track of hair along the thread/track. Allow product to dry, coat both sides of weft. Apply a second coat of sealant. Product dries quickly and cures immediately upon drying. DO NOT use this product to bond wefts/tracks to natural hair. Water Resistant.
